de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICFolder


  • public interface ICFolder
    Provides functions to manage folder objects Folder.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getFolderAPI().store(folder);

    • Method Summary

      • loadAllFoldersForSubproject

        List<Folder> loadAllFoldersForSubproject(int subprojectId)
        Loads all folders from subproject from the first folder-layer. Which other words loads a List of Folder which have no parentfolder. 
        Example:
 
 folder1-folder1.1
        \folder1.2
 folder2
        If you call this method with this folder structure you'll get folder1 and folder2
        Parameters:
        subprojectId - subproject
        Returns:
        list of Folder which are on the first layer
        was:
        getAllOrdnerForTeilprojekt

      • canCreateFolder

        boolean canCreateFolder(int subprojectId,
                      int parentId)
        Checks if the folder can be created
        Parameters:
        subprojectId - subproject id
        parentId - parent id of folder
        Returns:
        true if can be created :otherwise false

      • getAllFolders

        Hashtable<Integer,List<Folder>> getAllFolders()
        Load all configured Folders.
        Returns:
        Map containing subproject-ids as keys and folders as values.
